forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 1pm, then a chance of snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle. Cloudy, with a high near 32. East wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle. Cloudy. Low around 28, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. Northeast wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be open on 2/15 and 2/16.  Golf course and Shelden Trails are currently groomed.  Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 15, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  For today, February 15, 2025 grooming for classic ski only will take place on Coyote Run while Hawks Hill and Cedar Trace will be rolled only.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated the golf course this morning.  Skating was great, a little soft in spots, some grassy stubble, but no complaints!  Groomer was setting classic tracks on Coyote while I was there, they looked very grassy, so would not recommend classic (except on Buck's) unless you like skiing in the skate lane.  Cedar trace was also rolled.  Hawk's (south golf course) was pretty great for skate, but I skipped the "grotto of tears" which looked too hairy for me.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Being the very first on the groom today , I am biased : but boy oh boy it is nice at Nubs Nob ! LF 6

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 lifts, Rope Tow, and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. All trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM. Special night skiing session on this Sunday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's an awesome day to ski or ride at Nub's Nob. Snow began to fall early this morning. Over an inch of very fine and light snow has already accumulated on top of the grooming. We plan to do a second grooming of the green circle runs this morning to improve conditions for new skiers. A few more inches of snow are forecast to land throughout the day. There is no NASTAR racing this weekend due to the holiday. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break at 4:30 PM to groom for night skiing. Pete Kehoe will play the Nub's Pub today at 3:30 PM. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar until 3:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
